job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Qualificationsbr Proficient with systems thinking able to write software with code in a language that allows them to be successful in JavaScript NextJS ReactJS TypeScript GraphQL Apollo MongoDBbrbrResponsibilitiesbr What ongoing activities is the role responsible forbr Making the software systems that allows users to be successful in Murmurbr Talking to users to better understand the connection between what is being built and maintained and what is adding or reducing value in the marketbr Observing the software systems to optimize the implementation level of Murmurbr Tending the software systems to keep them easy to reason aboutbr Collaborating crossfunctionally with other roles in Murmur in making decisions about features and functionalities of Murmurbr Building resilient software through writing tests and documentation br Documenting how and why the software systems are built the way they are
